name: Thronehold Gates
description: The outer gates of Thronehold, where new adventurers begin their journey. The great stone walls loom overhead, and the sounds of the city echo from within.
lore: Thronehold stands as the last bastion of human civilization in the realm. Its gates have withstood countless sieges.

name: Weeping Woods Outskirts
description: The edge of the ancient Weeping Woods, where the elven city of Silverweave can be glimpsed through the canopy. Strange whispers drift on the wind.
lore: The Weeping Woods are said to remember every tragedy that has befallen the realm. The trees themselves bear witness to ages of sorrow.

name: Stonecrag Outskirts
description: The rocky foothills before the great mountain fortress of Ironhold. The air smells of forge-fire and stone dust.
lore: Ironhold was carved from the living mountain by the first dwarven king. Its halls have never fallen to siege.

name: Boglands Outskirts
description: The fetid swamplands surrounding Bloodmire. Mist clings to the ground, and the croaking of unseen creatures fills the air.
lore: Bloodmire rises from the swamps like a fortress of rot and ambition. Few who enter its gates leave unchanged.

name: Cryptlands Outskirts
description: The desolate lands surrounding Shadowgrave. Ancient tombstones mark forgotten graves, and the very ground seems to whisper of death.
lore: Shadowgrave is a city of the dead, where the living serve the undying. Its spires pierce the perpetual twilight.

name: Blackwood Forest
description: A dark, foreboding forest where sunlight rarely penetrates. Twisted trees and shadowy creatures lurk within.
lore: The Blackwood is said to be cursed. Those who enter rarely return, and those who do are never quite the same.

name: Shattered Plains
description: A vast expanse of broken earth and scattered ruins. The remnants of an ancient war still scar the landscape.
lore: The Shattered Plains were once a great kingdom. Now only ruins and memories remain, haunted by the echoes of the past.

name: Crimson Wastes
description: A barren desert of red sand and scorching heat. The bones of travelers and beasts alike litter the dunes.
lore: The Crimson Wastes are named for the blood spilled in countless battles. The sand itself seems to remember the violence.

name: Frostbite Peaks
description: Towering mountains wreathed in eternal snow. The cold here can freeze a soul as easily as flesh.
lore: The Frostbite Peaks are home to ancient dragons and forgotten treasures. Few dare to climb their heights.

name: Voidreach
description: A place where reality itself seems thin. Strange energies pulse through the air, and the laws of nature bend and break.
lore: Voidreach is where the barriers between worlds are weakest. Those who venture here risk being lost between dimensions forever.

name: Gloomfang Caverns Entrance
description: The mouth of a vast network of tunnels. Foul air and the sound of scraping claws echo from within. A sign warns: 'Beware - Level 5+ recommended'
lore: The Gloomfang Caverns are home to a tribe of goblins. Many adventurers have entered, but few have returned from the depths.
